title.example: App Crashes When Searching for Routes

description.example: The app crashes when I try to search for a route using public transit.

steps.example: 1. Open the app\n2. Search for a route\n3. App crashes

expected.example: The app should display the search results.

feature.example: It would be great if the app could display a 'real-time' indicator for when the next bus or train is arriving.

usability.example: The app is difficult to navigate.

performance.example: The app is slow to load.

experience.example: Overall, the app is useful but could be improved.

suggestions.example: Add more features for route planning.
